subject: Soccer
World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: The Italians refer to Pirlo as l’architetto or il professore — or simply Mozart — and his deft touch is likely to be essential in Brazil’s stifling heat.
snippet: The Italians refer to Pirlo as l’architetto or il professore — or simply Mozart — and his deft touch is likely to be essential in Brazil’s stifling heat.
